---
name: "Multi-Page Navigation"
about: "Add client-side routing for a multi-section experience."
title: "Feature: Multi-Page Navigation"
labels: [enhancement]
---

**Summary:**
Implement client-side routing to allow navigation between sections (e.g., Home, Activities, About, Contact).

**Details:**
- Use a routing library or framework to manage navigation.
- Each section should have its own URL and content area.
- Ensure smooth transitions and maintain state.

**Benefit:**
Improves organization and scalability of the app, making it easier to add new features.
